parameter.name: webPropertyId
parameter.description: Web property ID to retrieve the AdWords links for.

parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: Account ID to retrieve the adWords links for.

parameter.name: adWordsAccounts
parameter.description: A list of AdWords client accounts. These cannot be MCC accounts. This field is required when creating an AdWords link. It cannot be empty.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the link. This field is required when creating an AdWords link.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The fields which the response should show.

parameter.name: callback
parameter.description: Name of the JavaScript callback function that handles the response.

parameter.name: prettyPrint
parameter.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameter.name: userIp
parameter.description: IP address of the end user for whom the API call is being made.

parameter.name: adWordsLinkId
parameter.description: ID of the adWordsLink to update.
